title: hours
answer: Our restaurant is open from 9 AM to 10 PM every day. Special hours may apply on holidays.

list.title: Catering
list.answer: Yes, we offer catering for events.

list.title: Parking
list.answer: We offer free parking, valet services.

list.title: pet-friendly
list.answer: We allow pets in our outdoor seating area, but pets are not permitted indoors unless they are service animals.

list.title: Methods
list.description: What payment methods do you accept?
list.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and online payments through PayPal and  Google Pay

list.title: Promotions
list.description: Do you have any current promotions or discounts?
list.answer: Yes! You can find our current promotions by asking the chatbot for "deals" or visiting our website

title: Delivery
answer: Yes, we offer delivery through GOJEK

title: Outdoor
answer: Yes, we offer outdoor seating. It is available on a first-come, first-served basis, or you can make a reservation for outdoor seating.

title: Chat
answer: Our restaurant is open from 9 AM to 10 PM every day. Special hours may apply on holidays.
